description.narrative: NGO Health (NGO Zdravlje) is founded in 1995 and registered in 2002. Vision of NGO Health is better and healthier level of living condition awareness on different health issues helping seniors involving youth in as many social spheres of society as possibl e encouraging women in politics and increasing awareness on their rights. The overall objective of the project is minimizing the lead pollution consequences in northern Kosovo by identifying the level and forms of pollution raising the awareness and the kn owledge of both the citizens and the local institutions on the issue in order to develop sustainable policy on lead pollution prevention and treatment.Specific objectives: Provide comprehensive report on lead contamination areas levels and forms based on t he expert study conducted in northern Kosovo, Raising the awareness of the both population on one side and institutions and civil society organizations on the other about lead pollution problem through education and promotional campaigns, Development of su stainable Action plan on lead pollution issue that would be a product of cooperation among stake-holders on this matter such as: MNAO health houses and organization civil society organizations media and civil activists.
